amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be obligated or expended pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force after December 31, 2015.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be obligated or expended pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force after December 31, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 270 (Roll no. 347).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
